string-array.name: complement_list
string-array.item: You are so thoughtful in dealing with others.
We just love the way you multitask everything.
Your patience in dealing with others is what we admire the most in your personality.
You have an amazing sense of humor.
We like the way you handle people around you. And now we know why everyone admires you.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication, and you are a perfect example of it.
Will we ever be as polite as you are?
You are nicer to my friends than what we are.
You are a very smart girl.
You are just so charming.
We love the way you carry yourself... so enigmatic, so confident.
Oh my! What are we ever gonna do without you?
You make me proud.
You are so much fun to be with.
Thank you so so much, for being just the way you are.
You make us feel special.
We feel so comfortable around you.
When we are with you, it really doesn\'t matter where we are going. With you, it\'s always a good time.
